mapper.select: select doc_title as docTitle, writer, content, regdate, reply_no as replyNo from debatereply where doc_title = #{docTitle} order by reply_no
mapper.insert: insert into debatereply(doc_title, reply_no, content, regdate, writer, password) values(#{docTitle}, debatereply_seq.nextval, #{content}, sysdate, #{writer}, #{password})
mapper.delete: delete from debatereply where doc_title = #{docTitle} and reply_no = #{replyNo} and password = #{password}
